item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first post! Hello world!

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to My Blog! 🎉 This is where I plan to write about my triumphs and troubles in my cyber homelab. I aim to provide details on the projects I have worked on and new experiments I progress with. I am a Cyber Security enthusiast with a third for tinkering in my homelab. I am forever playing with new tools and to be honest, there are a lot of projects I wish I had finished.

item.title: Projects
item.description: 🛠️ My Projects Ticklist Link to heading 🔧 Infrastructure Projects Link to heading 🟢 pfSense Firewall Link to heading ☑️ Status: Ongoing 🟢 Synology NAS Link to heading ☑️ Purpose: Backup of all Virtual Machines ☑️ Status: Implemented 🟢 WD NAS Link to heading ☑️ Purpose: PLEX Media Server ☑️ Status: Implemented 🟢 iDRAC R710 Link to heading ☑️ Purpose: Used as an Ethical Hacking environment running on Proxmox ☑️ Status: Completed
